problem_description: Malicious code injected into open-source Python packages (PyPI) poses a growing threat to software supply chains, requiring detection methods that can identify obfuscated and semantically concealed adversarial components.
ai_technology_nature: Large Language Models (LLMs) with Multi-Agent Systems; Fine-tuned CodeBERT transformer model; LLaMA-3 agents for orchestration; Supervised learning with binary classification
